extendedInfo.description: Top debt reduction app in Google Play. Featured in "Amazing Android App for Dummies" book. Free lite version available. Uses snowball method and the strategy you pick to find your customized Debt Payoff Plan!Which card/loan to payoff 1st? How long does it take to be debt free? Find it with multiple strategies & become debt free!Month wise Snapshot View, Promotional rates, Pre-payment, graphs, export to Excel and email functions available. Enhanced Prepayment for Debt Payoff Planner- Allows user to enter multiple Prepayment which can be used for any or specific debt.- Saves prepayment input entered by user- Edit or Delete existing PrepaymentA Recommend Option to have a consolidated view of all Strategies. This gives your best case scenarios. A MUST TRY before you start to use the app.Now you can Backup your data and Restore it later. Comes handy if you are replacing phones or simply have to uninstall and reinstall. Data is NOT sent out of your device to anywhere. So make sure you have the SD card in place (in case your device supports it).For any country/loan/credit cards/Debt and with optional encrypted password protection.On Popular Demand! - Now you can track your payments, i.e. mark the past payments as Paid and count days to be debt free! This is via an optional add-on app purchase (Payment Scheduler) that has widgets, status bar notification and more. Check it out yourself!Any issues, please reach out to Dev. We cannot solve issues through poor reviews.

reviews.title: Great but missing an option
reviews.comment: This app is so great for figuring out debt payment strategy but it lacks one major thing - the ability to change payment frequency. I pay many bills weekly or biweekly. To surpass this, I multiplied the amount by 52 or 26 and divded by 12 but I would prefer the option to change payment frequency and to see what impact changing my monthly payments to weekly or bieeekly would have. Otherwise, I found this app very useful and easy to use.
reviews.author: Kelly Bairos

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.comment: I love this app.  Working on buying a house and this app helped me to understand where my money is going and how much I waste a month.
reviews.author: Patricia Daniels

reviews.title: Awesome debt planner
reviews.comment: I have dreaded this for some time but this app made getting organized easy!  Love it!:-)
reviews.author: Diedre Strickland

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: I have been using ERASE DEBT application for quite a few months now and it is an awesome app. I don\'t find anything wrong with it and it has been a huge help getting my financial obligations in order, and then you use the sister application PAYMENT SCHEDULER to remind you of your payments, and if you have any trouble or questions just write an email to the dev\'s and they\'re on it right away. Awesome apps and awesome developers.
reviews.author: rick barker

reviews.title: Well Designed
reviews.comment: Very easy to use and to follow.  One important feature would be to have the ability to add in \"raises\" by date...as well as set backs.
reviews.author: Scott Sarver

reviews.title: Only looks for SD backup
reviews.comment: Have HTC One. No sd card. Have my back up on the phone storage. Only searches for sd only. Not going to redo my debts. Pointless app now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very difficult.
reviews.comment: Just can\'t make any sense with this app whatsoever, it\'s the hardest one I have ever tried, I must just lack the intelligence needed to use it.
reviews.author: Lee Crapper

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I would give this all 5 stars, if I didn\'t have to switch screens to add a decimal point to each amount.  App is great at figuring out which bills to pay off first and shows how quickly I can get out of debt paying the least amount of interest.
reviews.author: Kimberly Lindsey

reviews.title: Some improvements needed
reviews.comment: 1. Doesn\'t work well with other keyboard like Chinese Pinyin (Google Pinyin Input) because it doesn\'t allow entering of decimal point when entering numbers. Should be independent of keyboards  2. Doesn\'t allow debts and debt payments to start from different months. Once a debt is entered, it starts from the current month and so does the payment. So you cannot plan ahead. 3. Need per debt\'s monthly transaction report showing for each month the payment, pre-payments, interest and balance.
reviews.author: Andy Koh

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: I love this app! So easy to use and creditors, amounts and plans can be tailored to your individual debts. The different plans allow for paying off high interest accounts or whatever you need....there is a plan for you! Big thumbs up :)
reviews.author: Debra McCann

reviews.title: too complicated
reviews.comment: different with other versions of android device.waste of money.this app was supposed to simple, help me and make things easier instead it\'s help button doesn\'t even explaij clearly where the menu is
reviews.author: marvin yan

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: It works! Great to be able to actually SEE progress!  \342\231\241
reviews.author: Deborah Johnson

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: Gives me a direction in life.
reviews.author: Christopher froeschl

reviews.title: Dont buy
reviews.comment: Calculations are off
reviews.author: Tom Oham

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: This app shows exactly what to pay each month to each of your cards, cars etc. (whatever debt you owe) and you enter the amount total that you have to spend and it gives you an affordable payment plan to become debtfree. There are different plans you can look at too.
reviews.author: Mel F

reviews.title: Very nice!
reviews.comment: Like that it is mobile and that i can see out by payments when debt free. Love this app! Recommend for anyone wanting to get all debt paid off and dont have the time to invest in creating spreadsheets or paper logs to do it yourself. App does it for you. Worth the .99 cents! Nice job!
reviews.author: Michelle Lynn

reviews.title: Major problem
reviews.comment: Great app, but password feature locks you out of program.  Really needs to be fixed. Yes I did log out after creating it and still have the problem.
reviews.author: Bob Podlaski

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: I bought this app and I can\'t really use it !! The letters & numbers doesn\'t show in the input fields ! Plrase try and fix it
reviews.author: Tawfiq Al Jaber

reviews.title: To many bigs n flaws
reviews.comment: Idea is good but app is bad
reviews.author: timothy h

reviews.title: Ten out of ten
reviews.comment: Great app shows how much interest to pay . So you can see the benefit of paying more off
reviews.author: A Google User
